name: Bonds of the Skies
description: A fantasy RPG with a story of friendship between humans and gods! Eil and Nogard set off to look for the demon who cast the town into a sea of flames, and to find other Grimoas in order to put a stop to its violence!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM Storage: 400 MB available space
